node.html:
Salary Prediction App made with StreamLit just to practice the Streamlit framework

A Streamlit demo written in pure Python to predict salary based on your years of experience.
A small real time chat application built using Django. It also uses Channels and Vanilla Javascript with Web Sockets.

Clean and simple to-do list application made with Django framework.

Features:

  • Easy add, delete and edit tasks
  • Reorder items
  • Login and register
  • Mark tasks as completed
  • Clean UI
"Who wants to be a Millionaire? (JavaScript Edition)" Terminal Game that I made to practice my JavaScript skills.

This is a web app which can be used to analyze users' sentiments across different platforms using REST Apis. Made with Python, Flask, HTML, Javascript and deployed using Vercel. The model was trained using tweets from Sentiment140 dataset with 1.6 million tweets.

A Knock-off of a retro space shooter game that I made with Pygame.

Xenith is a knock-off of a popular game called Space Shooters that I made for my Girlfriend on our 1st Anniversary using Pygame.
Flight Price Prediction with Tensorflow. Here you will be provided with prices of flight tickets for various airlines between the months of March and June of 2019 and between various cities.
Predicting the number of shares based on how popular the article is.
